This device is used.. * [http://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/MacBook+Air+11-Inch+Mid+2013+Teardown/15078/1 '''Apple''' MacBook Air Mid 2013 (11")] * [http://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/MacBook+Air+13-Inch+Mid+2013+Teardown/15042/1 '''Apple''' MacBook Air Mid 2013 (13")] [https://bbs.archlinux.org/viewtopic.php?id=165618 14e4:43a0 (106b:0117) PCI ID] ==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[[User:Skvo|''Skvo'']] [http://www.tonymacx86.com/general-hardware-discussion/99327-could-next-wlan-bluetooth-combo-card-2013-macbooks.html notes the pinout of the proprietary connector used on the '''tonymacx86 forums'''] *[https://applelife.ru/threads/zapuskaem-kombo-moduli-wi-fi-bluetooth-ot-apple-na-obychnom-kompjutere.39681/page-3#post-367183 On '''applelife''' forums] :[[Broadcom BCM94360CS2]] - MacBookAir, 2x ant., MIMO 2x2 :[[Broadcom BCM94360CS]] - MacBookPro, 3x ant., MIMO 3x3 :[[Broadcom BCM94360CD]] - iMac, 3x ant. + 1x ant. BT, MIMO 3x3 *[https://forum.manjaro.org/t/broadcom-bcm4360-wifi-not-working/2141 On '''manjaro.org''' forums]
